title: Fix private JWK format - replace 'use' with 'key_ops'
description: CRITICAL: Private JWK with 'use' property is causing authentication to fail completely. Error chain: ERR_CRYPTO_INVALID_JWK → ERR_JWK_INVALID → Unable to create JWT. Users cannot log in. Need to replace 'use' with valid 'key_ops' in the JWK configuration.
close_reason: Fixed by regenerating JWK with npm run generate-jwk. The script already correctly sets key_ops and removes the deprecated use property.
